Uses of Package
com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn

  • Packages that use com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn 
    Package Description
    com.simiacryptus.mindseye.eval  
    com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn  
  • Classes in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn used by com.simiacryptus.mindseye.eval 
    Class and Description
    CudaExecutionContext
    An execution context subtype that communicates CuDNN-related GPU information.
  • Classes in com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn used by com.simiacryptus.mindseye.layers.cudnn 
    Class and Description
    ActivationLayer
    The generic Activation layer, exposing the activation types provided by CuDNN.
    ActivationLayer.Mode
    The enum Mode.
    BandReducerLayer
    Similar to the pooling layer, but the pool size is always the image size.
    BinarySumLayer
    Computes a weighted binary sum of two layers.
    ConvolutionLayer
    This is the general convolution layer, allowing any number of input and output bands.
    CudaExecutionContext
    An execution context subtype that communicates CuDNN-related GPU information.
    CudaPtr
    A GPU memory segment
    CudaPtr.GpuStats
    The type Gpu stats.
    CudaResource
    A managed resource containing a native CuDNN resource, bound to its lifecycle with a prearranged destructor.
    CuDNN
    Main library wrapper class around the CuDNN API, providing logging and managed wrappers.
    GpuController
    Manages the GPU resources and related execution threadpools.
    ImgBandBiasLayer
    Adds a scalar offset to the input based on color band (3rd tensor dimension)
    ImgConcatLayer
    Concatenates two or more inputs, assuming they have the same width and height, to produce an image with both inputs' color bands.
    LayerPrecision
    An interface for CuDNN layers supporting any CuDNN numeric resolution type.
    MeanSqLossLayer
    Implements the RMS loss layer (without the final square root).
    PoolingLayer
    The standard image-pixel pooling layer.
    PoolingLayer.PoolingMode
    The enum Pooling mode.
    Precision
    This enum defines the levels or precision supported by (our support of) the CuDNN library.
    ProductLayer
    This layer multiplies together the inputs, element-by-element.
    SimpleConvolutionLayer
    This convolution layer only supports an equal number of input and output bands.
    SubsampleLayer
    Work in Progress.
